meanings.sent1: The stairs were clearly ascendable for the little puppy.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a steep but ascendable path for hikers.
meanings.sent3: The ascendable tree seemed to challenge the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was as ascendable as the highest peak.
meanings.sent5: The ladder's rungs were perfectly spaced, making it easily ascendable.

meanings.definition: Able to be climbed or scaled.
meanings.sent1: The rock wall was not very ascendable for beginners.
meanings.sent2: The rope ladder was sturdy and easily ascendable.
meanings.sent3: The ascendable cliff face tempted the adventurous climber.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as ascendable as the tallest tree.
meanings.sent5: The vines hanging down were surprisingly ascendable for the monkeys.

meanings.sent1: The hill was not very ascendable due to its slippery surface.
meanings.sent2: The staircase was wide and easily ascendable for all ages.
meanings.sent3: The ascendable mountain peak beckoned to the experienced climbers.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were as ascendable as the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The trail was clearly marked and perfectly ascendable for the group of hikers.
